query:
SELECT 
  'PROJETO' AS tipo,
  p.id AS id,
  p.nome AS nome,
  p.descricao AS descricao,
  NULL AS mercado,
  NULL AS segmentacao,
  NULL AS score
FROM projects p
WHERE p.nome LIKE '%Jeep%'
ORDER BY p.id DESC
LIMIT 1

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  'MERCADO' AS tipo,
  m.id AS id,
  m.nome AS nome,
  m.categoria AS descricao,
  NULL AS mercado,
  m.segmentacao AS segmentacao,
  NULL AS score
FROM mercados_unicos m
WHERE m.projectId = (SELECT id FROM projects WHERE nome LIKE '%Jeep%' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1)

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  'CONCORRENTE' AS tipo,
  co.id AS id,
  co.nome AS nome,
  co.produto AS descricao,
  NULL AS mercado,
  NULL AS segmentacao,
  co.qualidadeScore AS score
FROM concorrentes co
WHERE co.projectId = (SELECT id FROM projects WHERE nome LIKE '%Jeep%' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1)
LIMIT 10

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  'LEAD' AS tipo,
  l.id AS id,
  l.nome AS nome,
  CONCAT(COALESCE(l.setor, 'N/A'), ' - ', COALESCE(l.regiao, 'N/A')) AS descricao,
  NULL AS mercado,
  l.tipo AS segmentacao,
  l.qualidadeScore AS score
FROM leads l
WHERE l.projectId = (SELECT id FROM projects WHERE nome LIKE '%Jeep%' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1)
LIMIT 10;
